Job Description: Job Description            Nokia intends to occupy the leadership position in vRAN / ORAN. The recent importance of remote working will accelerate adoption of 5G and cloud based technologies. Towards this, we look forward to take on board motivated professionals for the development of the cloud based 5G product, the Fronthaul Gateway (FHGW). We have a rich and exciting roadmap for FHGW                Job Responsibilities & Competencies              Requirement Analysis, Design & Development of cutting edge 5G cloud based product.             Take ownership and lead the features for e2e development             Develop deep & wide spread competence in the areas of Linux Kernel and Container Orchestration              Qualifications             Mandatory skills              Over 8 years of experience in analysis, design and development of Telecom software products using C on Linux             Proficient in design patterns, large scale software systems, 4G / 5G technologies             Hands on experience with containerization (Kubernetes, Docker, Ansible, Helm Charts)             Hands on experience with GIT / GERRIT                  Additional skills preferred            Hands-on experience with any of the following             4G / 5G Telecom             IP Networking (Routing, SONIC / SAI)             Service Availability Forum, IPMI standards             Yocto / Buildroot             Python
